summary: REQ-6 through REQ-9 appear implemented: the demo image asset is present under public assets, Demo & Media image URLs are resolved against the app base path via a new helper, images have an error fallback UI, and images are clickable to open full-size in a new tab. However, the diff summary also indicates multiple unrelated landing page expansions/section changes that were not requested and may violate the stated non-goals (changes unrelated to Demo & Media).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded multiple new landing page/documentation sections and related navigation/config (e.g., PracticalApplicationsSection, ThresholdDiagramSection, ManualSection, ArduinoCodeSection, nav updates), which were not requested and are outside the Demo & Media scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly state not to change landing page sections unrelated to Demo & Media; the diff summary shows broad additions/updates beyond Demo & Media.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions PracticalApplicationsSection, ThresholdDiagramSection, ManualSection, ArduinoCodeSection, TopNav updates, App.tsx orchestration)
frontend/src/siteConfig.ts (summary indicates extended configuration for applications/hysteresis beyond media)
